698660.name: UKNON Jones & Guynelk - Awesome!
698660.description:
After a tragedy, UKNON Jones, Guynelk and Elsa LOVELUST decide to meet Doctor Gamma to save their friends.

Explore this open world and find all the hidden G-atoms in the world to power the time machine from the

doctor to hope to change things!

Main Features :

-Cross this vast world with varied environments, alone or in local multiplayer.

-Use your different items like a drone that stuns enemies and monitors the surroundings, or the X-bomb that can create explosions.

-Face increasingly 18 difficult bosses and find their weak point.

-Participate in various mini-games or compete against your friends in split screen.

-Chat with an in-game AI or scanning a QR code can reveal a character to help you defeat your enemies.

-Take advantage of certain powers such as the ability to be giant, reverse gravity or jump very high.

-Take photos of enemies or characters to get information about them in this game created by one person in 7 years.
698660.supported_languages:
英语, 法语*, 日语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
